title: FRITTE / APOTHECARY
description: A small cabinet on the wall, right next to the posters.

dialogueTree.title: Saint-Batiste Pharmaceutics: "A small cabinet on the wall is fill..."
dialogueTree.text: A small cabinet on the wall is filled with various medicine bottles, nasal sprays and blister packs. They all bear the Saint-Batiste Pharmaceutics logo.

links.title: You: ""What do those products do?""
links.text: "What do those products do?"

links.title: Frittte clerk: ""Uhm... I don't know, let's see......"
links.text: "Uhm... I don't know, let's see... Nosaphed is a nasal spray. Drouamine is a really good painkiller. Magnesium is a dietary supplement. Hypnogamma is..." She stops.

links.title: Frittte clerk: ""I don't really know what Hypnogamm..."
links.text: "I don't really know what Hypnogamma is. I guess it makes you feel less shit? It's recommended to use after lots of partying, studying, or exercising."

links.title: You: ""Can you be a little more... specif..."
links.text: "Can you be a little more... specific?"

links.title: Frittte clerk: ""Uhm..." She chews her bubblegum ab..."
links.text: "Uhm..." She chews her bubblegum absent-mindedly. "No, sorry. I'm not, like, a doctor or anything."

links.title: Tutorial Agent: "NOSAPHED heals +1 Health. DROUAMINE..."
links.text: NOSAPHED heals +1 Health. DROUAMINE heals +3 Health. MAGNESIUM heals +1 Morale. HYPNOGAMMA heals +3 Morale.

links.title: You: ""Thank you for explaining, miss.""
links.text: "Thank you for explaining, miss."

links.title: Frittte clerk: "Her nose is already back in her mag..."
links.text: Her nose is already back in her magazine. "Uh-huh."

links.title: You: ""Who is Saint-Batiste?""
links.text: "Who is Saint-Batiste?"

links.title: Frittte clerk: ""Saint-Batiste? You know..." She no..."
links.text: "Saint-Batiste? You know..." She nods slowly at the cabinet. "The pharmaceuticals company?"

links.title: Frittte clerk: ""Saint-Batiste Pharmaceuticals? The..."
links.text: "Saint-Batiste Pharmaceuticals? The one that sells meds out of Saint-Batiste?" She points to the cabinet. "That one? There?"

links.title: Encyclopedia: "She is right! Saint-Batiste the com..."
links.text: She is right! Saint-Batiste the company derives its name from Saint-Batiste the city, itself so named... because that's what it is. A rare case where that really is the full etymological history -- as far as almost anyone knows, at least.

links.title: You: ""Do you have any ammonia?""
links.text: "Do you have any ammonia?"

links.title: Frittte clerk: ""Yeah... there's like an ampoule so..."
links.text: "Yeah... there's like an ampoule somewhere." She waves her hand in the air absent-mindedly.

links.title: You: ""I want to buy some ammonia.""
links.text: "I want to buy some ammonia."

links.title: Frittte clerk: ""M'kay." She hands you a small caps..."
links.text: "M'kay." She hands you a small capsule. "Don't, like... over-do it or something."

links.title: You: ""Can I have Nosaphed?""
links.text: "Can I have Nosaphed?"

links.title: Frittte clerk: ""Mkay, here. I hope Saint-Batiste m..."
links.text: "Mkay, here. I hope Saint-Batiste makes you feel better or something."

links.title: You: ""I need Drouamine.""
links.text: "I need Drouamine."

links.title: Frittte clerk: ""Mkay, here. I hope Saint-Batiste m..."
links.text: "Mkay, here. I hope Saint-Batiste makes you feel better or something."

links.title: You: ""A bottle of magnesium, please.""
links.text: "A bottle of magnesium, please."

links.title: Frittte clerk: ""Mkay, here. I hope Saint-Batiste m..."
links.text: "Mkay, here. I hope Saint-Batiste makes you feel better or something."

links.title: You: ""I'll take some Hypnogamma.""
links.text: "I'll take some Hypnogamma."

links.title: Frittte clerk: ""Mkay, here. I hope Saint-Batiste m..."
links.text: "Mkay, here. I hope Saint-Batiste makes you feel better or something."

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Saint-Batiste Pharmaceutics: "A small cabinet on the wall is fill..."
dialogueTree.text: A small cabinet on the wall is filled with various medicine bottles, nasal sprays and blister packs. They all bear the Saint-Batiste Pharmaceutics logo.

links.title: Frittte clerk: ""Uhm, just ask me if you need anyth..."
links.text: "Uhm, just ask me if you need anything from Saint-Batiste. We don't stock prescription meds, but we do have nosaphed, drouamine, magnesium and hypnogamma."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Their logo is the bloodless rose --..."
links.text: Their logo is the bloodless rose -- pure white, untouched by harm.
